mapper.insert: INSERT INTO faqs (category, question, answer, order_num, is_active, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{category}, #{question}, #{answer}, #{orderNum}, #{isActive}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT faq_id, category, question, answer, order_num, is_active, created_at, updated_at FROM faqs WHERE is_active = TRUE ORDER BY order_num ASC, created_at DESC

mapper.update: UPDATE faqs SET category = #{category}, question = #{question}, answer = #{answer}, order_num = #{orderNum}, is_active = #{isActive}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE faq_id = #{faqId}
